Text:
So you 'ruined' the 720p HD version by making it fit your 1970's 'TV resolution'.  Super...

Keep this shit out of the Highres section.

Sorry, I tried to edit this torrent to remove from the high-res section like you said but I can't.

I will remember in future not to put anything I downmix into high-res section.

Thanks for the tip.
Thank you for this. Especially the subs which I have been unable to find anywhere else.  Pay no attention to negative comments.
afkuser... the "720p HD" Versions arent 720p, they are 960x720 which is 4:3..

Everyone - 720p refers only to the height of the picture.  YIFY and others upload many movies that are only 540p in height  but still are classified Highres.  Evilabbot - as I watch these episodes I see no reason they should not be classified as Highres.  Keep up the good work and thank you again!!!
@seaford - thanks for the encouragement. Still, I should probably put any future down-mixes out of this section, just in case. I don't want to be violating any rules of the site :)
Thank you very much, sir!! Any chance you could do the same thing with Original Series BRRIP's? I'd do it myself, but my computer isn't up to the challenge. :)

Not good rip for being BR, blurry and sometimes pixxels..
rly dispointd
